attributes.action: Save remaining Grammar schools, and create more.
attributes.additional_details: Grammar Schools in places such as Reading are trying to be shut down by councils and the government. Save Grammar schools, and roll the system out across the country. Grammar schools allow academic students higher grades (proven) consistently. Comprehensives are ridiculous - you can't provide the same curriculum for every single student, so bring in grammar schools for those more academically gifted to thrive.
